Package tp3

Class Point

java.lang.Object
tp3.Point
public class Point extends Object
Represents a point in 2D plane with x and y

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Point()
    Default constructor calling the single parameter constructor Initializes with a default value of 0 for x-coordinate
    Point(int a)
    Constructor initialize the x to the a value, and y to 0
    Point(int a, int b)
    Constructor initialize the x and y coordinates to (a,b)
